author: Staff Reporter
text:
With distribution of gold for Mangalyam to last batch of beneficiaries, Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam announced that freebies have been distributed to all eligible beneficiaries in the district.

The government has successfully completed its distribution in municipalities, village and town panchayats.

Distributing gold for mangalsutra to beneficiaries at a function held here on Friday, he said all beneficiaries had been covered and free mixer grinders and fans, goats and cattle, laptops and gold were given to all eligible beneficiaries. The AIADMK fulfilled all its electoral promises successfully within 57 months, he added.

It was the only government that allocated one fourth of its total revenue towards education.

Such high allocation and proper spending had pushed the State to higher level in having a high number of literates.

Capitalising the presence of sizable women beneficiaries, the Finance Minister appealed to them to extend full support to the party and strengthen the hands of the Chief Minister.

Later, the Minister distributed four gram gold and Rs.50,000 to 105 beneficiaries and four gram gold and 25,000 cash to 725 beneficiaries, who passed HSC and SSLC examinations, and house site pattas to 93 beneficiaries.

On the whole, freebies worth Rs.3.64 crore were given to 923 beneficiaries at the function. Collector N. Venkatachalam accompanied him.
title: Distribution of freebies over, says O. Panneerselvam
